Groups.Title: Statuses
Groups.Subtitle: Tweets and Timelines
Groups.Description: All commands and queries related to statuses

Items.Title: Tweet Demo
Items.Subtitle: Send a tweet
Items.Content: This will update the user's status and return the new status. You'll see the new status appear in a message box.

Items.Title: Home Timeline Demo
Items.Subtitle: Show home timeline
Items.Content: This page lets you click a button to refresh the page. At that time, the page will perform a query that obtains the home timeline of the authorizing user.

Groups.Title: Streams
Groups.Subtitle: Receive data from streams.
Groups.Description: Streams allow you to view real-time data from Twitter and is more efficient than performing REST API queries.

Items.Title: Filter Stream Demo
Items.Subtitle: Show filtered tweets
Items.Content: The filter stream allows you to specify a query string to return tweets for. You can also filter a stream by users or location.

Items.Title: Sample Stream Demo
Items.Subtitle: Show random tweets
Items.Description: Streams a random sample of Twitter data.
Items.Content: The Sample stream provides approximately 1% of the Twitter stream and is a random sample from the Twitter API.

Items.Title: User Stream Demo
Items.Subtitle: Show tweets for a user
Items.Content: The user stream lets you stream activity data for a user's account.
